Omek::IAlertListener Class Reference

Interface for alerts callbacks. More...

#include <include/Shadow/IAlertListener.h>

List of all members.

Public Member Functions

virtual void onAlert (const IFiredEvent *alertEvent)=0

Detailed Description

Interface for alerts callbacks.

This interface should be implemented by any class that handles the fired alerts

Member Function Documentation

virtual void Omek::IAlertListener::onAlert ( const IFiredEvent *  alertEvent) [pure virtual]

calllback method called when the requested alert becomes active

Parameters:
[in]alertEventcontains all the info of the fired alert
